document.full_text: don mattingly, in his first year as the dodgers' manager, is trying to focus on the field, not on the turmoil that could lead to the sale of the team.
document.title: mattingly looks past dodgers' financial fray
lines_and_colors: don mattingly, in his first year as the dodgers' manager, is trying to focus on the field, not on the turmoil that could lead to the sale of the team.
